name: Xenu and the Masters of the Universe
name_original: Xenu and the Masters of the Universe
description:
VERSION 1.0.2 IS NOW LIVE!! FIRST BOSS BATTLE HAS BEEN IMPLEMENTED.

VERSION 1.0.3 IS NOW LIVE!! MUSIC AND SOUND EFFECTS IMPLEMENTED.

Xenu and the Masters of the Universe!

Crawl through a series of procedurally generated dungeons, playing as a variety of aliens, to protect your home from the invading humans. Fend off Astronauts, Scientists, Military Personnel and more! 

I really hope you all enjoy playing this game. I have put a ton of time in so far, and learned so much. I am excited to continually update and release more for this game. 

Please use the Discussion Board to give me any and all feedback about the game. 

Plans for coming updates:

  1. -Menu's
  2. -Music
  3. -Boss Fights
  4. -More Variety in the Dungeons.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Dash

Left Mouse - Shoot

Tab to swap weapons

All boxes can be broken by dashing through them. 

Thank you for playing my game.
